column4: need help please!!!???!!   im trying to install windows xp i had ubuntu installed ... i didnt UNinstall ubuntu i just fdisked and repartitioned then installed xp after all dos files were copied and xp needed restart to finish ... reestart still tries to start "grub" then has error 22 and locks up
i am installing xp before ubuntu i fdisked then installed xp but grub did not erase
how do i get RID of grub so my c drive will boot xp?
typically XP overwrites its own bootloader on the MBR. Its odd that it didnt for you. You may have to use the 'XP Rescue Disc' in order to do it
